SamPy.astronomy.datamanipulation.rollingAverage¶

SamPy.astronomy.datamanipulation.rollingAverage(x)¶

Returns the average between the cells of a list.

Parameters:
  • x – a Python list of values
Returns:

a NumPy array of averages
